title: Council Decision of 29 June 1998 appointing members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 June 1998 appointing members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (98/C 222/03)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives for the period to 22 October 1998:
A. >TABLE>
B. >TABLE>
C. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 June 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
